name: Tony's Redemption
description: This is my final project for the game development course at WMU. I used the knowledge from my previous projects and put all of it into this game, and I think it turned out alright. I ran into the issue of scope for this project because with finals approaching and other classes project deadlines coming up I didn't get to work on this game nearly as much as I wanted to, but on the positive side, my friend Josh and I plan to continue development on this game once the semester ends.
